title: People are asking for Morde nerfs
body:
If you are one of these people. Would you please shut the hell up until he has been Live for a Patch.

Seriously begging for Nerfs on a Champ that isn't released is Idiotic.

Edit: For those who Require Clarification(despite it being obvious if you read the context), Yes i am indeed talking about the New Rework Mordekaiser.
